size f 3 75 mm crochet hook stitch marker scrap of plastic canvas for brim approximately 26-30 of thin elastic gauge 3 stitches = 1 measurements average ladies approximately 21 at brim abbreviations pattern uses us terms chain chain ea each repeat repeat page | 2 single_crochet single_crochet decrease single_crochet 2 together decrease made pattern notes hat begins at top of head and is worked in continuous rounds without joining and then the brim is crocheted by working back and forth in row pattern hat working in rounds foundation row start with a magic_ring 6 single_crochet in magic_ring do not join with a slip_stitch but work in continuous rounds round 1 marking beginning of round 2 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around 12 single_crochet made move marker to first stitch of beginning of each new round round 2 * single_crochet in first single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 18 single_crochet made round 3 * single_crochet in first 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 24 single_crochet made round 4 * single_crochet in first 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 30 single_crochet made rounds 5-15 continue in established pattern increasing every round until hat measures approximately 9 5 across rounds 16-17 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around round 18 * single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease over next 2 single_crochet repeat from * around rounds 19-22 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around do not end off remove stitch marker top side of hat brim work in row row 1 chain 1 single_crochet in next 15 single_crochet row 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 13 single_crochet decrease over next single_crochet and next single_crochet from round 22 newsboy cap v 4 13 2014 row 3-8 chain 1 turn single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 13 single_crochet decrease over next single_crochet and end of next single_crochet from previous row end off page | 3 underside of hat brim work in row make separately to attach to cap later chain 16 row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in ea chain across 15 single_crochet made row 2-8 chain 1 turn single_crochet in ea single_crochet across 15 single_crochet made end off finishing weave in ends cut piece of plastic canvas to same size as brim join yarn with a slip_stitch to corner of brim single_crochet in ea single_crochet through both layers of brim inserting piece of plastic canvas as you go continue working single_crochet around rest of cap cut yarn leaving a long tail approximately 15 and sew seam of hat brim on the inside insert elastic and weave into stitches of round 18
